column4: also 11 million records is not all that big.  maybe a gig or two.  How fast do you need the searches to be?
when you say use grep, are you suggesting i set up a simple paste webserver and then grep a text file with all the data for a keyword and then sorting in programming logic?
you did not say anyting up front about a web front end. But sure.  a text field to collect the string and then grep agains the data seems like a simple approach.
